title: Les vacances de l'amour
overview: After winning the lottery, Jimmy takes the entire Le Miracle de l'amour gang to the paradise island of Love Island. By chance, they find Nicolas there, separated from Hélène who still lives in Australia. While they thought they would only stay on the island for a while, everyone decides to build their lives there, and the adventures they encounter on their way only further unite the members of the group.
